directions: Heat the oil in a wok or skillet over high heat. Add the shallots and saute for 3 minutes. Add the carrots and stir fry for 3 minutes. Add the green beans and stir fry for 2 minutes. Add the bok choy and stir fry for 2 minutes. Add the broth and simmer for 2 minutes. Add the soy sauce and serve.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh green beans, cut into 1 inch pieces
1/3 cup low sodium, low fat vegetable broth
title: Bok Choy, Carrots and Green Beans
